engine.android.util.manager

类 AlarmTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.android.util.manager.AlarmTimer

  • public class AlarmTimer
extends Object
    Thread-safe class that supports one or more alarm timers
    从以下版本开始:
    3/21/2014
    作者:
    Daimon
